1.title: Another Day in the Desert

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Deb takes part in a high-speed chase that ends in the tasing of a naked man. Lindsey arrests a man smuggling a van full of undocumented immigrants, Amie busts a big-time drug dealer and Kelly checks on an older woman in possible jeopardy.

2.title: I Did My Job Tonight

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Deb and Lindsey attempt to negotiate with a man who has barricaded himself in his apartment with a rifle; Kelly outsmarts a clever robbery suspect; and Amie intervenes in a public dispute between an armed man and his unpredictable mistress.

3.title: Super Mom with a Badge

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Deb braves a fierce rainstorm to help a teenager who has been run down by a drunk driver, Lindsey nabs two guys with a big bag of weed hidden in a shoe, Amie helps bring a sex offender to justice and Kelly investigates a surprising act of road rage.

4.title: The Infamous Two Beers

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Deb intervenes in a domestic violence case, Kelly participates in a drug raid that yields several arrests and Amie hooks a fugitive wanted for murder. Meanwhile, Lindsey stages a mission into the Arizona desert and ends up under fire from ruthless drug dealers.

5.title: One-Stop Shopping for Crime

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Kelly breaks up an unauthorized immigration operation and Deb gets more than she bargained for in a routine traffic stop. Lindsey deals with the same incorrigible teen more than once, while Amie fends off advances from a disruptive drunk.

6.title: You're High as a Kite

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Deb investigates a bloody motel shooting, Amie is forced to remove a cognitively impaired teenager from his foster home, Lindsey takes down a gang member and Kelly hunts down a slick deadbeat dad who tries to escape.

7.title: Your Hair... Take It Off

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Deb negotiates with a suicidal man barricaded inside his home, Lindsey has an amusing exchange with an enraged citizen, Amie helps a pregnant woman get to the hospital and Kelly busts a colorful ex-stripper wanted on a shoplifting warrant.

8.title: That's No Way to Be a Girl

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Lindsey breaks up a suspected porn shoot, an eccentric character tries to lecture Amie on the effects of marijuana, Deb arrests a bratty teenager and Kelly chases down a hit-and-run driver.

9.title: Just Another Day in the Life

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Kelly arrests a husband and wife on a techno warrant; Deb pulls over a quirky character who invites her back to his home for a night of music and dancing; Amie helps an overwrought mom in need; and Lindsey captures an alleged counterfeiting cat-lover.

10.title: Behind Bars

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot:

11.title: Top 10 Takedowns

episode of.title: Police Women of Maricopa County (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: On this special episode of "Police Women," we count down the season's top ten takedowns.
